page.title: 15The Library.
page.content: Sutton's library is not very big. It has 2 librarians and a computer catalogue and an about 10,000 books.On a full day over 400 books can go out. The mobile library comes daily at about 5.00.There is an outsize section with large books.There is a children's corner with cushions and seats. The librarians are{Mrs Cross}and{Mrs {Barton.}The library is quite good and there is even a "Teenage Section" with marked with a "T".Some of the younger children's books have a red square on them which means they are easy to read.{The Head Librarian: Mrs Barton likes her job very much.Her hobbies are antiques, picture-framing,cooking and of course reading!Her favourite TV show is the Antiques Road Show.She works 21 hours a week and prefers reference workand she likes history books.
